DOC.brief_summary: Study to evaluate subjective comfort associated with the use of a marketed lubricant eye drop, by subjects reporting ocular dryness and wearing soft contact lenses on a daily disposable replacement schedule.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of a Marketed Lubricated Eye Drop in Soft Contact Lens Wearers Who Experience Ocular Dryness
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to evaluate subjective comfort associated with the use of a marketed lubricant eye drop, by subjects reporting ocular dryness and wearing soft contact lenses on a daily disposable replacement schedule.
DOC.criteria: Normal eyes Topical ocular medication use Unstable or active ocular issues
